text: Association Chorrillos was a Peruvian football (soccer) club based in the city of Chorrillos, Lima, Peru. ==History== The club was founded in the Chorrillos District, Lima. The club was the 1951 Segunda División Peruana champion. Association Chorrillos participated in the 1952 Peruvian Primera División. ==Honours== ===National=== *Peruvian Segunda División: 1 ::Winners (1): 1951 ::Runner-up (2): 1950, 1961 ==See also== *List of football clubs in Peru *Peruvian football league system ==External links== * Peru 2nd Division Champions (Lima) * Peruvian First Division 1952 Category:Football clubs in Peru
title: Association Chorrillos
